title: Can't Let Go
description: This edition was previously published under the ASIN B07FTQX7MB Beau Cooper is living it up. Girls. Parties. And did I mention Girls? He has no plans to settle down. Why should he? Everyone wants him. Everyone except Mallory. The girl who changes his life. The girl who makes him believe in love. The girl he may have lost forever.   Warning: Sex, drug, alcohol, and foul language throughout.
author: Chrissy Brown
